attributes.action: get Student's Unions recognised as charities!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK Student Unions are classified as business, but they should be classified as either charities or as educational establishments since they directly are there to serve the students and a lot of money from them goes into corporation tax and they have to pay more for stuff like software, etc which directly affects their ability to support the students.
